text: w'idha ma 'unzlt surat tghamaz almunafiqun baleywn 'inkarana lnzwlha wskhryt wghyzana; lima nazal fiha min dhikr eywbhm wafealhm, thuma yqwlwn: hal yarakum min 'ahad 'iina qumtum min eind alrswl? fa'iin lam yrhm ahd qamuu wansrfu min eindih ealayh alsalat walsalam mkhaft alfdyh. saraf allah qulubahum ean al'iyman; bsbb 'anahum la yfhmwn wala ytdbrwn
